nodes.text: The Remitik system was a star system in the Outer Rim Territories. During the Galactic Civil War, an Imperial munitions depot commanded by Colonel Gralm was located in the Remitik System, and was attacked by the New Republic.

Remitik system first appeared in Star Wars canon in the 2020 video game Star Wars: Squadrons. The Remitik system first appeared in Star Wars Legends in the 1994 video game demo of Star Wars: TIE Fighter.
